plays.text: Goal scored by Sergei Brylin assisted by Pierre Dagenais and Scott Gomez
Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for High Sticking Pierre Dagenais
Penalty to Turner Stevenson 2 minutes for Obstruction - Holding Stephane Robidas

Goal scored by Yanic Perreault assisted by Oleg Petrov
Penalty to Jason Arnott 2 minutes for Boarding Benoit Brunet
Penalty to Martin Rucinsky 2 minutes for High Sticking Sergei Brylin
Goal scored by Andreas Dackell unassisted
